Key Match Events: Jón Dagur Þorsteinsson scored the only goal of the game in the 12th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Gareth Southgate told Channel 4 that the result was 'good' for the team
Former England players Wayne Rooney and Joe Cole were more positive, saying England needed to look at the bigger picture
Miscellaneous Highlights: The defeat drew comparisons to England's stunning defeat to Iceland at the 2016 European Championships
Others: England only managed one shot on target in the entire contest
Southgate will also have concerns over the fitness of centre back John Stones, who was replaced at half-time after appearing to roll his ankle in the first minute
